## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/deziikuoo/NEXA-v1.git
cd NEXA-v1

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt
npm install

# Set up environment variables
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your API keys

# Start the application
npm run start
```
